assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nicca Chemical Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells surfactants for textile chemicals, metals, pulp and paper, paints, dyes, synthetic resins, and dry cleaning and professional cleaning agents in Japan and internationally. The company offers textile chemicals, including oiling, scouring, chelating and dispersing, defoaming, leveling, soaping, fixing, water absorbing quick dry, anti-static, fluorocarbon-based water and oil repellent, soil-release, napping, anti-bacterial, and anti-odor agents, penetrating agent for alkali reduction and mercerization, as well as provides bleaching stabilizer, in-bath quality improver, light fastness improver, machine cleaner, silicone based water repellent, flame retardant, softener, and stiffener. It also provides specialty chemicals comprising agents for pulp and paper, metalworking chemicals, recording paper, and surfactants products. In addition, the company offers performance chemicals comprising abrasive resistance, good shock absorption, high durability, softness, toughness, heat resistance, lubricity, slidability, water and oil repellent, anti-blocking, softness, smoothness, defoaming, high refractive index, optical scattering, high hardness, high coating abrasive, and hydrophilic / anti-fogging, high solubility products, as well as provides antifouling and anti-fingerprint and low dielectric properties. Further, the company offers laundry chemicals for dry cleaning industry. Additionally, it provides detergent for linen supply, as well as offers infection control chemicals for medical and welfare fields. Furthermore, the company offers functional photo-cross-linker, carbon fiber composite material, and femtoreactor products. The company provides ultra dispersed diamonds, a transparent projection screen. It also offers hair and scalp care, styling, pre and post treatment, perm, hair color, skin care, and hair straightener products. Nicca Chemical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Fukui, Japan.
